text: Unibuke ubwo Allah yakwerekaga mu nzozi ko (ingabo z’abahakanyi) ari nke; ariko iyo aza kuzikwereka ari nyinshi, rwose mwari gucika intege kandi mwari no kubijyaho impaka (mwibaza niba byari ngombwa kurwana nazo). Ariko Allah yarabarinze. Mu by'ukuri, ni We Mumenyi uhebuje w'ibiri mu bituza (by’abantu)
